70010000057614.description:
Co-op cooking game
1-4 players
250+ levels
30+ hours of gameplay

Cooperate & communicate to cook delicious dishes in this #TrulyTogetherGaming experience. Visit different countries to learn the secrets of local cuisines, upgrade your kitchen appliances and immerse yourself in a deep story about food, love and the hidden costs of freedom. Engage in split-second PvP battles or make your own kitchens in the Level Editor and share them with the community. Everyone will find a taste of their own in Let’s Cook Together 2.

KEY FEATURES:
•	4 cuisines with a total of 220+ levels; minimum 30 hours required to beat the main storyline
•	Highly accessible gameplay for players of all abilities
•	Level Editor with cross-platform level sharing
•	Separate level layouts for 1, 2, 3 and 4 players
•	9 playable chefs with unique skills
•	Upgradable kitchen appliances with unlockable gameplay-changing features
•	Split-second battle mode (PvP)
•	Twitch integration - stream viewers can vote on various effects that affect the streamer’s game
•	Community Levels - play levels made by the community for an infinite amount of fun and challenges
•	Choose your chef!
•	Level editor
Design your own kitchens and customize whole levels. Use the powerful circuit system with logic gates for limitless creativity. With cross-platform level sharing, the community members can play and rate your levels for endless fun.
•	Upgrades
Upgrades are game-enhancing features that allow you to improve your gameplay experience. As you progress through the game, unlock and purchase kitchen appliance upgrades to become the ultimate chef and conquer increasingly complex culinary adventures.
•	Recipes
From a wide collection of Polish dishes such as bigos, pierogi, and kopytka, through Japanese cuisines like sushi, gyoza, and udon, to Italian master recipes like pizza, bruschetta, and lasagne, players will be able to learn a diverse selection of menus from around the world. Grab your spatula, and let's start discovering the cookbook! 

STORY
A few hundred years into the future, the World is under the rule of Nutri-Inc - a seemingly evil megacorporation.
Nutri-Inc promotes a #ZeroWasteMoreThanTaste way of life. Normal, unprocessed food is claimed to be toxic and people are forced to eat only Nutri-Paste: a tasteless homogenic paste made out of all edible ingredients (including tree bark, weeds and stems). Growing or preparing your own food is forbidden and all knowledge of cooking techniques has been lost. Tasteless lives make people apathetic, ambitionless and generally dumb. Technology is at a standstill.
The Resistance, led by General Ohm and formed of people who were taste-awoken, fights a losing battle. That is until they construct a device that allows them to re-discover the recipes of the old world…
70010000057614.intro:
Team up, cook fast, and master 65+ dishes!
Travel the world, upgrade your kitchen, and conquer 250+ levels. Communication is your secret ingredient!
70010000057614.name: Let's Cook Together 2

70010000077575.description:
Set sail to save the day in this colorful strategy RPG! Join Marona – a gifted young girl with the power to speak to Phantoms – as she traverses the ocean world of Ivoire, providing aid to those in need. When a fleet of ghost ships attack, it’s up to Marona and her new friend Apricot to assemble the legendary crew that once defeated these spectral foes. 

Recruit Phantoms, bind them to objects, combine them with Gadgets, and even merge them with Marona herself to unleash show-stopping abilities and sink the Shipwreck Fleet!
70010000077575.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence and coarse language

70010000078661.description:
Discover the hilarious world of Big Helmet Heroes, a 3D beat 'em up combining combat and adventure. Find 29 adorable heroes hidden in fantastic kingdoms and choose your favorites to save the princess. Play alone or with a friend, and try to overcome the formidable challenges that await you!

- Epic and endearing heroes: there are 29 in total, each mastering one of 4 formidable combat styles and possessing their own unique superpower—find them all!

- Hilarious battles: face hordes of goblins and formidable bosses, use the environment to your advantage, and wield whimsical weapons to defeat them!

- Vast and imaginative worlds: explore stunning levels, from medieval fantasy to realms filled with mummies, pirates, and even charming yet fearsome unicorns!

- Local co-op mode: defeat enemies, strategize together, and enjoy chaotic situations as you fight side by side with a friend.

- A challenge for all: easy to start, but much more demanding for the skilled and daring.
70010000078661.intro: Pick your hero and save the princess!
70010000078661.name: Big Helmet Heroes

70010000078850.description:
Your landlord is banging on the door. You have a single coin left to your name. You insert the coin into your slot machine and... JACKPOT! Luck be a Landlord, tonight! 

Collect symbols, build synergies, and defeat capitalism in this cult classic roguelike deckbuilder - now on consoles by popular demand.

Luck be a Landlord combines the unpredictable thrill of slot machines with the strategic depth and replayability of classic deckbuilders. Choose symbols to add to your machine and watch them interact to earn you coins every spin - will you stack your deck with cats, gemstones, fruits…?

Every round the rent increases, but have no fear - capitalism is no match for your cunning. Choose from a varied pool of items to further customise your deck, and watch your coins grow. How long can you hold out against your landlord’s greed?

Note: this game contains no microtransactions or real-world currency gambling.

FEATURES

- A Quirky Cast of Characters
add symbols to your machine and watch them interact with one another for powerful combos - will you bank on common symbols, or hold out for something more rare?

- Items Galore!
Refine your strategy with items that buff your build, grant extra coins, or make new effects.

- Different Every Run
With more than 150 symbols and 220 items, no two games are alike! Play what you have and discover new strategies.

- 20 Levels to Climb
Defeated your landlord? There’s plenty more where they came from. Ascend through the floors of your apartment building to tackle increasing levels of difficulty.

- Bite-Sized Play Sessions
An average single run takes less than half an hour, perfect for when you're on the go or pressed for time.
70010000078850.intro: Collect symbols and spin to defeat capitalism in the iconic roguelike deckbuilder!
70010000078850.name: Luck be a Landlord

70010000083151.description:
Based on the popular long-running animated science fiction franchise, MACROSS -SHOOTING INSIGHT- is a brand-new Multi-Dimensional Shooting Game!

Pilots, songstresses, and characters from five MACROSS series (MACROSS Plus, MACROSS 7, MACROSS Zero, MACROSS Frontier & MACROSS Delta) take center stage in a completely original story. When multiple dimensional folds suddenly occur across space-time, pilots and songstresses alike find themselves inexplicably transported to the Battle 7. From there, five stories unfold with the fate of the galaxy at stake.

Sortie with pilots from different time periods and go through stages made up of multiple scenes in this Multi-Dimensional Shooting Game. Stages include multiple shoot 'em up game styles, such as vertical shooting, horizontal shooting, 360-degree shooting, and more.

Includes fan-favorite songs from all featured MACROSS series and use the power of songs to gain an edge in battle! Synchronize with songstresses while playing stages to activate a variety of buffs and debuffs, such as increased firepower, increased maneuverability, reduced enemy fire speed, etc.

Features
•	Brand new and original story 
•	Characters from 5 different MACROSS anime series
•	Multiple Shoot'em Up styles in each level (horizontally scrolling shooting, vertically scrolling shooting, and 360-degree scrolling shooting)
•	Fan-favorite songs from all featured MACROSS series
•	Japanese dub
•	English localization


MACROSS -Shooting Insight-’s Western version includes the latest improvements now available in the original Japanese release:

•	Difficulty: A setting has been added in order to allow for more HP recovery through automatic recovery. A Boost setting has also been added to the current auto-recovery amount.  The player’s HP will now recover at a much faster rate after taking damage than it did in the original Japanese version of the game.
•	Continues: After getting a “Game Over” in the middle of a stage, players can now restart from the same stage, even if they have returned to the menu. This allows players to try again as many times as they wish.
•	Music: The length of Diva songs that are activated during gameplay has been adjusted. The length of time between the end of a Diva song and the return to the regular stage music has been adjusted.
•	Quality of life: The game controls, which were displayed only once in the original version of MACROSS -Shooting Insight-, will now be displayed anytime the player pauses the game.
70010000083151.intro: Embark upon a galaxy-spanning mission to rescue the missing songstresses!
70010000083151.name: Macross -Shooting Insight-

70010000084450.description:
A CLASSIC CONCEPT, TILTED
Under Defeat is a vertically scrolling shooter where you control a helicopter capable of moving in eight directions. It's a sleek, streamlined experience with just two buttons—fire and bomb—making it easy to pick up but hard to master. What sets the game apart is the tilt mechanic: as you turn, your shots tilt slightly left or right, allowing for strategic, angled attacks. You also have a small, satellite-like option unit that shoots independently. However, charging it requires you to release the fire button for a while, creating a tactical ebb and flow rarely seen in this all-out shoot 'em up genre.

NEW ADDITIONS
There’s a big difference between an arcade game and one you play at home, and Under Defeat has gotten several new additions since its arcade debut in 2005. The New Order Mode adapts the game to a modern 16:9 format, and the game has received both sharper textures and four selectable soundtracks. This includes a brand new one from original composer Shinji Hosoe, known for his work on Ridge Racer, Tekken, Street Fighter EX, SuperSweep among many others. Of course, for an authentic experience, you can still play Under Defeat in its original arcade format. How you enjoy this bombastic action fest is entirely up to you! 

A BLAST FROM THE PAST
Under Defeat is a true classic. The game first appeared in arcades, developed by G.rev and released in Japan almost two decades ago. Over the years, it has made its way to several platforms. Most notably, it was released on the Dreamcast in 2006—long after official support for the console had ended. This 2024 edition is the ultimate version of the game, containing all previous content, meticulously ported by genre veterans. 

NEVERENDING WAR
Under Defeat doesn’t throw you into an incomprehensible sci-fi universe that make no sense. Instead, it offers a (mostly) realistic depiction of a futuristic past. Specifically, you play as a helicopter pilot in a drawn-out war between the German-speaking Empire and the English-speaking Union, a conflict that has raged for over a decade. Both sides are exhausted, with heavy losses on each side, yet peace remains elusive. Will this destructive conflict ever end? You'll have to play to find out!
70010000084450.intro: FIGHT FOR PEACE IN THE ULTIMATE VERSION OF AN ALL-TIME CLASSIC!
70010000084450.name: Under Defeat

70010000087088.description: Solve mysteries, find the lost, help people in trouble, track down criminals and save lives as Biscuit, the one-and-only doggo detective! User her superpowered hearing and scent tracking skills to catch criminals, solve crimes, track the lost and rescue people in mortal danger! As Biscuit, your kindness is a weapon against suffering. Use it.
70010000087088.intro: Sniff. Track. Hunt criminals. Find and rescue victims.
70010000087088.name: Lost and Hound

70010000087193.description:
The ultimate marble shooter game combines puzzle-solving skills with fast-paced action. Each level presents a unique puzzle layout filled with colorful marbles that you must skillfully shoot to match and clear. The game is simple to learn but hard to master, offering endless hours of engaging gameplay.

As you progress, the levels increase in complexity, introducing obstacles, intricate paths, and a variety of power-ups that can clear the board faster or change the game in unexpected ways. Aim carefully and plan your shots to trigger massive chain reactions and earn maximum points.

Whether you're looking for a quick break or a lengthy puzzle adventure, the diverse levels will keep you entertained.
70010000087193.intro: Get ready to blast your way through 200 vibrant and challenging levels in Zumba - The Marble Shooter Tikki Adventure.
70010000087193.name: Zumba - The Marble Shooter Tikki Adventure

70010000088633.description:
Get ready for an action-packed challenge where every strike brings you closer to victory! Join friends or family in up to four-player matches, compete in thrilling tournaments against top bowlers from across the lanes, and bowl in amazing alleys with cool views. Only the best players make it to the final rounds – will you be the one holding the trophy?

Skyline Bowling isn’t just about throwing the ball; it’s about using the right gear and clever strategies! Boost your skills with special gear like gloves that give your ball extra spin or shoes that make it roll faster. Choose from different bowling balls, and earn experience to unlock new tournaments and amazing bowling alleys with fun surprises! Collect skills to help you get even more strikes. Are you ready to bowl your way to the top?

Features:
• Local multiplayer - Compete against your friends and family in matches for up to 4 players!
• Motion Controls - Feel like you're truly bowling with motion controls that respond to every move!
• Exciting Tournaments - Compete in rounds and aim for the finals, where only the best bowlers make it.
• Customize Your Character - Personalize your bowler with cool gear, such as gloves and shoes.
• Challenging Arenas - Unlock amazing new alleys with fun twists as you level up.
• Powerful Skills - Use active and passive skills to boost your chances of winning!

Get ready to roll, aim, and strike your way to victory in Skyline Bowling!
70010000088633.intro: Strike out the competition and become the ultimate bowling champ! Ready to roll?
70010000088633.name: Skyline Bowling

70010000088771.description:
Vampire Waifu Puzzle invites you to piece together stunning anime vampire waifus in this thrilling jigsaw puzzle game!

Select from 6 different puzzle sizes and immerse yourself in a collection of beautifully illustrated anime vampire characters. Whether you’re a casual puzzler or a seasoned pro, there’s a challenge waiting for you.
70010000088771.intro: Create stunning anime vampire waifu art through puzzles!
70010000088771.name: Vampire Waifu Puzzles

70010000088914.description:
Step into the world of high-end car care in Car Detailing & Wash Simulator : Luxury Car Cleaner!
This is not your average car wash—here, you’ll be entrusted with the most rare, expensive, and exotic cars in a vibrant and upscale neighborhood. 
Your mission is to provide premium detailing services to these luxury vehicles, ensuring they look and feel like new.
In this game, you’ll use state-of-the-art tools and techniques to pamper a variety of high-performance cars, sports cars,
 and rare collector’s models. Each vehicle requires a meticulous approach, from delicate hand washes and paint protection 
to deep interior cleaning and tire detailing. The environment around you is just as polished as the cars you care 
for—beautiful, high-end neighborhoods and well-designed garages give you the perfect setting to work on these automotive 
masterpieces.
Key Features:

Luxury and Exotic Cars: Work on high-end sports cars, rare classic models, and limited-edition supercars. Each car comes with unique detailing challenges and luxury features.

Realistic Detailing Tools: Use professional-grade tools like high-pressure washers, foam guns, microfiber cloths, polishers, and vacuums to deliver perfect results.

Stunning Environments: Care for cars in beautiful, upscale neighborhoods, premium garages, and scenic locations with dynamic weather effects and day-night cycles.

Deep Customization: Unlock upgrades for your tools, shop, and vehicles as you progress. Offer customers personalized services to meet their exacting standards.

Time Management & Customer Satisfaction: Manage your schedule, prioritize jobs, and ensure each car gets the attention it deserves, all while keeping your customers happy and your reputation spotless.

Satisfying Progression: As you level up, gain access to more expensive cars, exclusive detailing services, and higher-end equipment, transforming your business into a top-tier luxury care service.
Whether you’ve always dreamed of working with rare cars or simply enjoy the art of vehicle restoration, Car Detailing & Wash Simulator:Luxury Car Cleaner offers the perfect blend of challenge and satisfaction. 
Take your skills to the next level, and become the go-to detailer for the elite clientele of the city!
70010000088914.intro: Luxury Cars, Flawless Shine – Master the Art of Detailing!
70010000088914.name: Car Detailing & Wash Simulator : Luxury Car Cleaner

70010000090072.description:
Step into the brutal world of ancient Rome in Survival Gladiator: Blades of the Coliseum, a 3D game of action and strategy where you manage your own gladiator empire. As a master of gladiators, your mission is to train and equip your fighters, sending them into fierce battles in the Coliseum to prove their strength and earn glory.

Key Features:
- Train and Equip Gladiators: Purchase new weapons and armours, build gladiator schools, and train your fighters based on their unique types, from agile sword wielders to trident and fishnet handlers.

- Manage Gladiator Resources: Take care of your gladiators' living conditions, ensuring they stay strong and ready for battle. Proper care increases their morale and performance in the arena.

- Buy and Train Slaves: Acquire slaves and turn them into powerful gladiators, training them to become champions in your arena. You can also put them up for auction to earn additional profits.

- Dynamic Combat and Strategy: Each gladiator type has unique abilities and fighting styles, requiring strategic preparation for each fight. Plan your tactics wisely to ensure victory in the bloody arenas.

As you progress, the stakes rise, and every decision you make influences both your fighters' fates and your legacy. Can you build an unstoppable gladiator force and conquer the arena, or will the weight of your responsibilities bring you down?
70010000090072.intro: Train gladiators, conquer the arena, build your legacy!
70010000090072.name: Survival Gladiator: Blades of the Coliseum

70010000090603.description:
SUGORO Quest: The Quest of Dice Heroes comes to the West for the first time! This is a board game-style turn-based RPG where dice will decide your fate!

The story begins in the kingdom of Siland, where four adventurers set out to talk to the king in search of intrepid adventures. Each adventure is different, so be sure to choose the most suitable member for each journey.

A school of magic? An adventure at sea? It's up to you(and luck, of course) to make sure the adventure has a good ending! But beware of the enemies, as they won't make your path easy.
Luck will lead you to victory!


Features:
* Available in English for the first time!
* Choose from 4 different heroes, each with their own unique abilities
* Explore 6 lands full of treasures and dangerous monsters
* Save state function: save wherever you want to in the game, and restart from that exact point
* Screen filters: select from several filters to modify how the game looks (retro-style monitor, black-and-white, etc.)
* Gallery: view images from the original game’s manual and box design
* Cheats function: activate cheats that will make your mission a lot easier (infinite lives, invulnerability, etc.)
70010000090603.name: Sugoro Quest: Dice Heroes

70010000090892.description: In the vibrant world of Beeflandia, our hero Beef Cat and his friends always know how to celebrate the good times. But when a mysterious Big Guy shows up and stirs up trouble, everything changes. The peaceful vibes are over and it’s time for a new kind of adventure!
70010000090892.intro: The epic adventure of Beef Cat and his friends begins.
70010000090892.name: Beef Cat Ultra

70010000090994.description:
The Liar’s Tavern draws you into a shadowy pub where deception and danger collide. This immersive 3D psychological thriller pits you against three other players in a high-stakes game of dice or cards—but with deadly consequences. Bluff, accuse, and strategize carefully, as every lie or misstep could lead to a fatal drink or a game of Russian roulette.

Survival is your only goal. Each round is a nerve-wracking duel of wit and paranoia, where reading your opponents and mastering the art of deception are key. Choose one of four unique characters, each with hidden motives, and navigate the eerie atmosphere of the tavern, where every decision shapes the unfolding drama.

With unpredictable outcomes, intense mind games, and a richly dynamic setting, The Liar’s Tavern challenges you to outwit and outlast. Will you emerge as the ultimate deceiver, or will your lies catch up with you?
70010000090994.intro: Outwit, deceive, survive—where every lie could be your last.
70010000090994.name: The Liar's Tavern

70010000091051.description:
This game, released in 1986 in Japan, is an adventure game where players take on the role of Lieutenant Brian=W=Kernighan. Piloting the Armored Fighting Walker, Galleouse, the player must defeat three bio-dolls lurking within the research facility.

The game progresses with a 3D RPG-like feel. In addition to moving forward, backward, left, right, and rotating left or right, the player can also perform a 180-degree turn, making for realistic, mech-like movements. When encountering enemies, battles are command-based, but with movement incorporated into the command selection, allowing for highly immersive combat. Utilizing movement-based tactics will be key to overcoming challenges in the game. 

Since this isn’t an RPG, relying on character growth or brute force to push through isn’t possible, which might be seen as challenging, potentially sparking mixed reactions. However, for users seeking a satisfying sci-fi game, this title is recommended. Additionally, interactions with over 20 unique characters and the distinct world setting are also highlights!


*The main game and gallery screen (*Gallery) are in Japanese version.
*Other menu screens and "How to play" screens are in English.
70010000091051.intro: Pilot the Armored Fighting Walker, Galleouse and destroy the bio-dolls occupying the secret research facility. A hardcore sci-fi adventure!
70010000091051.name: EGGCONSOLE CARMINE 88 PC-8801mkIISR

70010000091344.description:
Dive into the microscopic world, radiating with bioluminescent life. Genome Guardian is a deeply-complex shooter that's easy to pick up but hard to master. Research permanent upgrades to survive a variety of microbes across 6 game modes, each with multiple "depths".

Pair DNA nucleotides Adenine (rapid fire), Cytosine (precision), Guanine (spread), Thymine (explosive) to discover wild hybrid bioweapons!
* Bomb + Shotgun combines explosives with spread to create Blast Shotgun!
* Bomb + Bomb doubles down on explosive power to make Bazooka!
* Blast Shotgun + Shotgun forms the all-powerful Flak Cannon!

* 49 Turrets with unique strengths and functions
* 96 Perks to mix and match that drastically change how you play
* 75 Weapon & Turret Mods that can turn shots into sticky laser mines or bouncing fireballs
* 64 Mutations alter the challenges you face each run
* 20-minute Runs that can be continued in Endless Mode
* 75 Bassy Electronic Tunes that adapt to the current mood & intensity
* Cosmetics like spider legs and tank tread
* Accessibility Settings for color blindness, motion sickness, and even arachnophobia!
70010000091344.intro: COMBINE WEAPONS in the microscopic roguelite turret shooter with macroscopic depth. Survive using an astounding array of turrets, perks, mutations and powers.
70010000091344.name: Genome Guardian

70010000091654.description:
This game is a drone simulation game that allows you to experience real drone flight based on footage shot by a real flying drone.
There is no up, down, left or right direction control, only the control to increase or decrease the drone speed. You can also fly while changing the drone's flight mode among three at any time.

Enjoy the beautiful scenery of Danyang-gun, Korea with "real" footage!
This work takes place in Danyang-gun, Wonju-si, and Chungjuho.
There are a total of 9 flight courses.
1080P high-definition footage faithfully reproduces the atmosphere of real nature, providing a strong sense of immersion in the game.
Smooth and realistic video playback makes you feel like you are a real drone pilot.
Large capacity! You can fly to 9 locations showing the beautiful scenery of Danyang-gun, Wonju-si, and Chungjuho!
Two play modes are supported: course-specific driving mode and view mode automatic flight. There is also an achievement system.
Visit Danyang-gun, Korea from home at any time!
Enjoy the drone flight control experience and the beautiful natural scenery. MasCon for Nintendo Switch™, made by Zuiki of Japan, is also supported.
70010000091654.intro: A simulation game where you directly operate a drone based on actual drone flight footage! You can enjoy the actual beautiful natural scenery in high definition
70010000091654.name: Korean Drone Flying Tour Danyang-gun

70010000091856.description:
Bad Parenthood plunges you into a psychological horror where bedtime stories turn into waking nightmares. Play in a suburban home haunted by The Storyteller, a sinister entity born from parental warnings and childhood fears.

Key Features:
- Psychological horror rooted in family dynamics and childhood fears
- Survival gameplay with choices that shape the terror
- Environmental storytelling through eerie notes, drawings, and secrets
- Immersive audio to bring the horror to life

Bad Parenthood forces you to confront the monsters you create—can you protect your family from the fears you’ve awakened?
70010000091856.intro: Survive the nightmare born from your own stories.
70010000091856.name: Bad Parenthood

70010000092618.description:
Get ready for non-stop fun in Stacky Dash! Slide to collect tiles, build paths, and race through colorful levels full of exciting surprises. Dodge blasting cannons, and zip through portals as you conquer each tricky stage!

Save adorable animals to grow your own zoo and take on timed challenges to test your speed. With tons of cool skins to unlock, every level is packed with energy and fun!

Features:
• Exciting Levels - Tons of fun puzzles that get trickier as you go!
• Crazy Challenges - Dodge cannon fire, zoom through portals, and avoid traps.
• Animal Rescue - Find cute animals and grow your zoo!
• Timed Mode - Race the clock for an extra challenge and rewards!
• Customization - Unlock awesome skins for your character and tiles.

Solve your way through endless puzzles in Stacky Dash!
70010000092618.intro: Dash your hero across the mazes, stack the tiles higher and higher, and reach for the skies!
70010000092618.name: Stacky Dash

70010000092675.description:
"Silent Forest: Deadly Night Horror" is an intense shooter-horror game that takes players into a dark and mysterious forest. Your mission is to track and eliminate an unknown creature that terrorizes the surroundings. You have only 7 days and nights to complete your task — or you will become its next victim.

Starting from a hunter's camp deep in the woods, where the previous hunter went missing, you must explore abandoned houses, towers, caves, and an old cemetery to gather vital resources and equipment. Your arsenal includes a hunting rifle and a sniper rifle. Ammo is limited, so use it wisely.

During the day, the creature is less active, but at night it becomes faster and more aggressive. Set up motion-sensor cameras to monitor its movements from your van. However, be cautious — the monster can destroy the cameras, signaling that it's near. Use traps and collect medkits to increase your chances of survival.

Each night becomes more dangerous as the creature grows stronger. Manage your time and strategy carefully.

Game Features:

●Unique Shooter-Horror with Survival Elements: Explore a dark forest filled with dangers.
●Dynamic Day-Night Cycle: The monster becomes more active and dangerous at night.
●Diverse Locations: Abandoned houses, watchtowers, caves, cemeteries, and more.
●Limited Resources: Find ammo, medkits, and traps to survive.
●Camera Surveillance System: Set up motion-sensor cameras and monitor the forest from your van.

Intense Atmosphere and Tense Gameplay: Fog, eerie sounds, and a terrifying environment create an unforgettable horror experience.
70010000092675.intro: Silent Forest: In this forest, silence is deadly. Hunt or be hunted.
70010000092675.name: Silent Forest: Deadly Night Horror

70010000092880.description:
Perfect for puzzle lovers seeking a calming experience!

30 Unique Levels: 
Stunning puzzles with nature and cosy village themes.

Charming Artwork: 
Gorgeous hand-drawn illustrations to piece together.

Varying Difficulty: 
Levels become more challenging as you progress, keeping it engaging.
70010000092880.intro: Unwind and escape into a peaceful world of jigsaw puzzles! Enjoy 30 beautiful levels featuring serene nature scenes and charming little towns.
70010000092880.name: Relaxing Jigsaw

70050000053991.description:
With this DLC, You'll unlock:
- 3 powerful balls: Lightning, Electron and Dragon Egg!
- A Neotech T-Shirt for better accuracy!
- Energy Gloves for extra spin!
- Bolt Shoes for more speed!
- 100K coins to upgrade your gear!

Equip the power of lightning and bowl like never before!
70050000053991.intro: Light up the lanes and shock the competition!
70050000053991.name: Skyline Bowling: Light Style

70050000053992.description:
With this DLC, You'll unlock:
- 3 powerful balls: Liquid, Swirl and Monster!
- A Prismatic T-Shirt for better accuracy!
- Polychrome Gloves for extra spin!
- Refraction Shoes for more speed!
- 4K gems to buy new gear!

Dazzle your rivals! and glow like a star!
70050000053992.intro: Brighten your game and outshine the competition!
70050000053992.name: Skyline Bowling: Bright Style

70050000054520.description: Unlocks Minty’s exclusive outfit for Putties.
70050000054520.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Exclusive Putty Outfit: Minty
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence and coarse language

70050000054521.description: Unlocks Marona and Ash’s Phantom Isle outfits.
70050000054521.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Marona & Ash Phantom Isle Outfits
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence and coarse language

70050000054522.description: Exclusive to Season Pass purchasers! Unlocks new “Three Buccaneers Outfits” color options for the Sailor, Healer, and Chef!
70050000054522.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Season Pass Bonus: The Three Buccaneers Outfits
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence and coarse language

70050000054966.description:
Includes the following:
1. 10x Boost Ticket 
2. 5x Boost Ticket 
3. 2x Boost Ticket
70050000054966.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Digital Deluxe Edition Bonus
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence and coarse language

70050000055160.description:
With this DLC, You'll unlock:
- 5 premium action skins
- 7 cool premium tiles
- 2500 coins to get more skins
- 500 gems to expand your zoo
- 15 keys for rescuing animals

Solve your way through endless puzzles with new skins and tiles!
70050000055160.intro: Slide into action and stack to the top!
70050000055160.name: Stacky Dash: Action Pack

70050000055163.description:
With this DLC, You'll unlock:
- 5 premium anime skins
- 7 cute premium tiles
- 2500 coins to get more skins
- 500 gems to expand your zoo
- 15 keys for rescuing animals

Solve your way through endless puzzles with new skins and tiles!
70050000055163.intro: Slide into style and stack like a true anime hero!
70050000055163.name: Stacky Dash: Anime Pack

70070000026173.description:
Step into the enchanting world of Vege Bubble Shot, a colourful and addictive puzzle game that will captivate your gaming senses. Dive into a fruity adventure where you'll use your strategic skills to save a delightful vegetable garden from pesky intruders and become a puzzle master!

Key Features:

    Vivid Vegetable Vistas: Immerse yourself in a mesmerizing world brimming with hand-crafted, vibrant vegetables. Explore lush garden settings and interact with charming characters.

    Challenging Puzzles: Put your aim and matching skills to the test with a variety of engaging puzzles. Can you clear the garden of intruders with your accurate shots?

    Power-Ups and Boosters: Utilize an array of powerful boosters and unique power-ups to enhance your gameplay. Create spectacular chain reactions to tackle the intruders with flair.

    Endless Fun: Vege Bubble Shot offers hundreds of levels, ensuring hours of engaging entertainment for both short and extended gaming sessions.

    Easy to Learn, Challenging to Master: The game is designed for players of all skill levels, with straightforward mechanics for beginners and depth for those seeking a greater challenge.

Multiplayer included! Vege Bubble Shot is the perfect game for both casual players and competitive gamers. Aim, shoot, and match your way through the captivating vegetable garden, and bring back harmony one bubble at a time. Don't miss the opportunity to experience this addictive and colourful adventure!

This bundle includes base game, Harvest Havoc #1 and Harvest Havoc #2 with:

- 40 all-new levels
70070000026173.intro: Pop, Match, Harvest! Dive into a vibrant veggieventure!
70070000026173.name: Vege Bubble Shoot Deluxe Edition

70070000026176.description:
Welcome to glamorous "Fashion World," where style meets puzzle in a dazzling arcade adventure!

If you've got a flair for fashion and a passion for puzzles, "Fashion World" is your runway to shine. Transform into a chic stylist aiming to capture the most fabulous outfits and become a celebrated fashion photographer.

- 80 levels of fashionable fun!
- Create stunning looks with countless combinations of costumes, accessories, and scenic backdrops!
- Capture your creations in Photo Mode!
- Strive for perfection with the three-star rating system, boosting your game's replay value.
- Designed for fashion lovers of all ages!

This bundle includes base game, expansion pack #2 (Street Style) and expansion pack #3 (New Wave) with:

- 40 all-new levels of puzzles
70070000026176.intro: Maker your mark in the Fashion World!
70070000026176.name: Fashion World Value Edition

70070000026187.description:
This impressive Season Pass set is packed with downloadable content!
It includes the following:

1. Bonus Story: Parallel Siblings *A scenario about Castile the Chroma and Walnut, characters from Phantom Brave, joining the party. (Coming early 2025)
2. Bonus Story: Heroes of the Past *A scenario about Scarlet and Sprout, characters from Phantom Brave, joining the party. (Coming early 2025)
3. Bonus Story: The Wandering Pirate *A scenario about Samayoi from BAR Stella Abyss joining the party. (Coming early 2025)
4. Bonus Story: The Liar and the Lost *A scenario about the Liar Princess from The Liar Princess and the Blind Prince joining the party. (Coming early 2025)
5. Bonus Story: The Girl Who Cried Ghost *A scenario about the Girl (Kotomo) from Yomawari: Night Alone joining the party. (Coming early 2025)
6. Bonus Story: The Rat Who Demons Fear *A scenario about Mad Rat & Heart from Mad Rat Dead joining the party. (Coming early 2025)
7. Season Pass Bonus: The Three Buccaneers Outfits
8. 10x Boost Ticket 
9. 5x Boost Ticket 
10. 2x Boost Ticket 
11. BOR Bag 
12. Mana Bag 

Note: The above bonus may become available separately at a later date.
Contents listed above may also be purchased separately. Please be careful to avoid double purchasing items.
70070000026187.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Season Pass
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence and coarse language

70070000026188.description:
In addition to the full game, this impressive Digital Deluxe Edition is packed with bonus content!
This edition includes the following:

1. Bonus Story: Parallel Siblings *A scenario about Castile the Chroma and Walnut, characters from Phantom Brave, joining the party. (Coming early 2025)
2. Bonus Story: Heroes of the Past *A scenario about Scarlet and Sprout, characters from Phantom Brave, joining the party. (Coming early 2025)
3. Bonus Story: The Wandering Pirate *A scenario about Samayoi from BAR Stella Abyss joining the party. (Coming early 2025)
4. Bonus Story: The Liar and the Lost *A scenario about the Liar Princess from The Liar Princess and the Blind Prince joining the party. (Coming early 2025)
5. Bonus Story: The Girl Who Cried Ghost *A scenario about the Girl (Kotomo) from Yomawari: Night Alone joining the party. (Coming early 2025)
6. Bonus Story: The Rat Who Demons Fear *A scenario about Mad Rat & Heart from Mad Rat Dead joining the party. (Coming early 2025)
7. Season Pass Bonus: The Three Buccaneers Outfits
8. 10x Boost Ticket x 3
9. 5x Boost Ticket x 3
10. 2x Boost Ticket x 3
11. BOR Bag x 2
12. Mana Bag x 2
70070000026188.name: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero - Digital Deluxe Edition
ratingContent: Mild fantasy themes, violence and coarse language

70010000090188.description:
Welcome to the not-so-glamorous side of space exploration! In Space CleanUp: Cosmic Robot Disinfector, you take control of a high-tech android tasked with a vital but messy job: cleaning up space stations after intense alien battles.
Game Features:
- Unique First-Person Adventure: Experience a fresh perspective on space exploration as you navigate conquered stations from a first-person viewpoint.
- Become a Cosmic Janitor: Wield a powerful water jet to blast away green alien goo and debris, leaving the stations sparkling clean.
- Treasure Hunter by Day, Cleaner by Night: Use your laser to collect valuable artifacts left behind in the chaos, preparing the stations for future use.
- Unlock New Locations: As you progress through the game, your cleaning expertise will unlock access to new and exciting space stations.
- Stylish Sci-Fi Interface: Immerse yourself in a world of sleek technology and futuristic aesthetics.
- Intriguing Storyline: Unravel the mysteries behind the alien conflicts and the importance of station restoration.
- Engaging Gameplay: Combine satisfying cleaning mechanics with exploration and light puzzle-solving for a truly unique experience.
Can you rise to the challenge and turn the tide of space station sanitation?
70010000090188.intro: Fight cosmic grime with your trusty robot disinfector!
70010000090188.name: Space CleanUp: Cosmic Robot Disinfector

70010000092645.description: Connect the small cute kittens and experience how they grow bigger. There is a single-player mode and various two-player modes ('Time Limit' and 'Attack').
70010000092645.intro: Connect small cute kittens to big cats.
70010000092645.name: Drop That Cat

70010000092653.description:
Get ready for a high-energy arcade adventure with Toon Breakout 3D! Smash through bricks, bounce off cartoon characters, and conquer a series of action-packed levels in a vibrant, cartoon-styled universe. With realistic physics, multiple soundtracks, immersive sound effects, and dazzling animations, this game delivers the ultimate breakout experience.

Key Features

- Vivid Cartoon-Style 3D Graphics
Dive into colorful, dynamic levels where every brick, character, and effect pops with life and personality.

- Soundtracks & Immersive Sound FX
Enjoy a variety of soundtracks to set the perfect tone for your smashing adventure, paired with sharp, dynamic sound effects that amplify every hit, bounce, and explosion.

- Realistic Physics for Maximum Fun
Feel the precision and thrill of smooth, responsive gameplay. Each bounce, smash, and ricochet behaves exactly as you'd expect, with a touch of cartoon flair.

- Power-Ups to Keep You Smashing
Unlock powerful boosts to elevate your gameplay:

Multi-Balls: Unleash a frenzy of balls for chaotic fun.
High-Speed Balls: Test your reflexes with lightning-fast action.
Exploding Balls: Wipe out bricks and characters in spectacular style!

- Smash Bricks and Cartoon Characters
It’s not just bricks in your way—cartoon characters add a hilarious twist as they bounce, wobble, and react to your every move.

- Creative and Challenging Levels
Each level offers a unique layout, clever obstacles, and dynamic elements, keeping the gameplay fresh and exciting. Also available an endless mode level for endless fun!

Why You'll Love Toon Breakout 3D:

-A bold and colorful twist on a classic formula
-Dynamic soundtracks and sound effects create a truly immersive experience
-Perfect for quick bursts of fun or longer gaming sessions
-Endless replayability with evolving challenges

Smash Your Way to Victory!

Break through bricks, bash cartoon characters, and master each level in this one-of-a-kind arcade adventure. Toon Breakout 3D is the ultimate blend of strategy, action, and cartoon charm!
70010000092653.intro: Break Bricks, Smash Characters, and Conquer the Toon World!
70010000092653.name: Toon Breakout 3D

70070000026659.description:
Run and collect stickmen of your color to grow bigger and more powerful! Outsmart traps, avoid danger, and smash everything in your path. The bigger you grow, the more unstoppable you become!

Features:
- 5 new hats that will make you look unique!
- a new premium Jumping Uppercut animation!
- 500 free stickmen for your city
- 2500 extra gems to grow your character
- Collect stickmen of your color to grow larger and more powerful!
- Grow stronger and defeat huge giants in intense fights!
- Upgrade your town to earn passive income
- Fight through a series of enemies in survival mode and show your skills!
- Choose battle upgrades like extra health, a chance to dodge, critical hits, and more!
- Unlock awesome outfits and accessories to customize your character
- Buy new and epic finishing animations!

Face giant bosses in epic battles. Dodge their powerful attacks, strike back, and defeat them! Show your strength as you take down the biggest giants and prove you’re the best!

Unlock amazing rewards as you play. Upgrade your town to earn more money, customize your character with cool accessories, and unlock epic finishing animations!

Your decisions will make the difference between victory and defeat!
70070000026659.intro: Rush into a battle of giants!
70070000026659.name: Giant Rush: Brave Edition

70010000082742.description:
This game allows you to feel like a squad leader right on the battlefield.
Caesar needs you! Gaul won't be conquered by itself. Stand under the Eagle and lead the legion for the glory of Rome!

Game features:
- Control troops formation while playing as a single character
- Enjoy extremely dynamic and fun-filled battles
- Siege an enemy and defend your own castle in one match
- Create your own strategy in a game of 2-4 teams
- Feel the real Rome while passing the campaign based on real Caesar's battles
70010000082742.intro: Shieldwall is a funny third-person tactical battle simulator with strategy elements.
70010000082742.name: Shieldwall

70010000041431.description:
Pre-order Sid Meier's Civilization® VII Standard Edition and receive the Tecumseh and Shawnee Pack!* The Tecumseh and Shawnee Pack is included as part of the Deluxe and Founders Editions.

The award-winning strategy game franchise returns with a revolutionary new chapter. Sid Meier's Civilization® VII empowers you to build the greatest empire the world has ever known! 

In Civilization VII, your strategic decisions shape the unique cultural lineage of your evolving empire. Rule as one of many legendary leaders from throughout history and steer the course of your story by choosing a new civilization to represent your empire in each Age of human advancement.

Construct cities and architectural wonders to expand your territory, improve your civilization with technological breakthroughs, and conquer or cooperate with rival civilizations as you explore the far reaches of the unknown world. Pursue prosperity in an immersive solo experience or play with others in online multiplayer.**

Whether you choose to follow a path rooted in history or reimagine possibilities to chart your own way forward, build something you believe in and create a legacy that echoes through the Ages in Civilization VII.

*Pre-order offer available until February 11, 2025. Internet connection required to redeem bonus content. Terms apply.
**Map restrictions may apply to gameplay on Nintendo Switch™. More info available here: https://2kgam.es/Civ7FAQ.
70010000041431.name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII

70010000091307.description:
Dino decided to open a new market!
Customers will ask for specific items and you have to prepare them!
Once you complete a level, you can choose to rest and chill with your desktop companions.
Use productivity tools like timers and to-do lists to help you focus!

Features:
Build carts for new friends!
Choose the layout that works best for you!
Buy upgrades and automate the process!
You can play actively or passively
Use skills to give you a boost!
Complete challenges and try to be the best market in the world!
Unlock all the achievements!
Unlock all the carts!
Watch numbers go up!
70010000091307.intro: Run an idle market with your animal friends!
70010000091307.name: Dino Market

70050000050762.description: Customize your profile in Sid Meier's Civilization® VII using the special badge cosmetic item included with the Crossroads of the World Collection!
70050000050762.name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Crossroads of the World Collection - Cosmetic Bonus

70050000050906.description: Customize your profile in Sid Meier's Civilization® VII using the special badge cosmetic item included with the Right to Rule Collection!
70050000050906.name: Sid Meier's Civilization® VII: Right to Rule Collection - Cosmetic Bonus

70010000039149.description:
Make sure to add UNDYING to your Wishlist to be one of the first to experience this emotional tale when the game launches.

Infected by a zombie bite, Anling's days are numbered. She must now fight to survive, not for herself but her young son, Cody. Ensure Cody's survival in a zombie-infested world by protecting him and teaching him valuable skills, at any cost.

In this emotional survival game take control of Anling whose goal is to make sure her son Cody is safe and can live on after she turns. Limited resources must be managed in order to slow down Anling’s infection while also making sure

LIKE MOTHER, LIKE SON

Cody will learn from the actions his mother, from combat to cooking. Make sure he knows the basics of survival before it is too late.

WHEN LIFE GIVES YOU METAL PARTS…

Always be on the lookout for materials. You never know what is valuable to a trader, or what useful item you might be able to craft.

TICKING TIME BOMB

Anling’s infection is ever looming. Manage your days and make the most of the time you have left. You will need to keep pushing on, because time doesn’t wait for you.

CHERISH THE MOMENT

Do not lose sight of what you are fighting for. Enjoy the small moments...
70010000039149.intro: Anling's days are limited, she must fight to survive, not for herself but her young son, Cody. Ensure Cody's survival in this zombie-infested world that'll touch the hearts of players.
70010000039149.name: Undying

70010000090383.description:
Jigsaw Chronicles: Haunted Tales takes you on a journey across the globe, where puzzles reveal eerie folklore and haunted legends from four distinct continents. With 20 unique images and meticilously written stories, this game introduces you to the mysterious and supernatural tales that have shaped cultures throughout history.

Key Features:

- Four Haunted Categories: Explore the continents and discover folklore filled with haunted stories and chilling characters. Each region brings five unique puzzles and their own tale.
- Unique Stories: Each puzzle unlocks a unique narrative, bringing the folklore behind the image to life.
- Free Play Mode: Replay each puzzle with customizable difficulty—choose from easy, medium, or hard by adjusting the piece count.
- Enhanced Gameplay: Enjoy immersive puzzle-solving with haptic feedback and controller sound effects, adding a new dimension to the experience.
- Epic Visuals & Soundtrack: Enjoy high-resolution art and a hauntingly atmospheric soundtrack that complements the theme.

Jigsaw Chronicles: Haunted Tales offers a captivating mix of puzzle-solving and storytelling, perfect for those who enjoy both folklore and a touch of the supernatural. Will you uncover the mysteries hidden in these haunted legends?
70010000090383.intro: Piece together haunting tales from around the world.
70010000090383.name: JIGSAW CHRONICLES: Haunting Tales

70010000090764.description:
Get ready for explosive arcade-style platforming action as the caped bomb-collecting superhero returns in Super Jagger Bomb 2: Go East! This time, bombs have been placed at landmarks and monuments across the globe, spanning from Europe and India to China and Mongolia, and it’s up to Super Jagger to save these international treasures from certain destruction.

Run, jump, fly and dash your way across dozens of unique stages in 2.5D style as you dodge enemies and collect bombs as fast as you can. Complete levels without dying to gain extra lives and use bonus rounds to multiply your score. Collect coins, practice, earn flight licenses and even unlock new playable heroes!

Features:

• Master bite-sized platforming stages in arcade-style action!
• Avoid enemies and traps as you gather and disarm bombs as quickly as possible.
• Get extra lives by maxing out your speed and survival skills!
• Use bonus rounds to multiply your score and aim for the top.
• Save national treasures, landmarks and monuments to become the ultimate hero!
• Earn flight licenses and unlock new playable characters!
70010000090764.intro: Disarm bombs as fast as you can to save the world in platforming superhero style!
70010000090764.name: Super Jagger Bomb 2: Go East

70010000092004.description:
Get ready to flap, dash, and soar in Penguin Flight, a delightful 2D pixel art platformer that blends charm, challenge, and creativity! Join a little penguin with big dreams as he embarks on a journey to touch the skies, navigating through 40 meticulously designed levels brimming with fun mechanics, vibrant visuals, and heartwarming adventures.

Your mission? Guide the penguin to the floating balloons at the end of each stage to inch closer to his ultimate goal of flying, while uncovering surprises, mastering new mechanics, and proving your platforming prowess!

Main Features
Accessible yet Engaging Gameplay: A lighthearted platformer that’s perfect for casual players but offers challenges for those seeking mastery.
Jump and Dash Mechanics: Use intuitive controls to avoid obstacles, clear gaps, and reach each level’s balloon.
Innovative Power-Ups: Discover bubbles for extra jumps and cyclones to teleport across tricky sections, adding depth to the gameplay.
Progressive Level Design: Start with straightforward stages, then tackle increasingly intricate levels as you master the mechanics.
Hand-Crafted Pixel Art: Immerse yourself in a colorful and whimsical world filled with charming animations and lively environments.
Seamless Flow: Enjoy smooth level transitions and instant retries to keep you in the action.
Every balloon brings the little penguin closer to his dream of flight. Are you ready to help him soar?
70010000092004.name: Penguin Flight

70010000073246.description:
The Urban Myth Dissolution Center – your one-stop solution for dissolving and dealing with cursed relics, monstrous oddities, and dimensional anomalies!
Take on cases revolving around urban myths as Azami Fukurai, the heroine, under the supervision of Ayumu Meguriya, Level S psychic and Center Director...

■Game Overview
The game takes you on an episodic digital mystery adventure, exploring various urban myths that haunt the internet, all presented in stunning psychedelic pixel art.

The player takes control of Azami for the detective legwork, collecting circumstantial evidence and social network posts to unravel the truth behind each urban myth, as well as the hidden pasts of each client, and why they came to encounter each oddity. The dissolution of each urban myth leads to unexpected consequences and hidden truths...

■The Urban Myth Dissolution Center
The Urban Myth Dissolution Center is a privately owned institution specializing in adaptive researchーboth onsite and onlineー, collection, and psychic divination, led by Center Director Ayumu Meguriya, focusing on the numerous urban myths that roam the offline and online worlds.
70010000073246.name: Urban Myth Dissolution Center

70010000076089.description:
Have you ever had a failed date? Are you tired of having awkward moments with strangers you just met from an online application or friends? Now's your chance to change that. It's time for YOU to become cupid and match couples together in this immersed, compelling story-based game.

Starting as an amateur in the ways of romance, you will quickly learn what it takes to fulfill people's hopes and dreams. Gain reputation points and cash for matching couples successfully, unlock upgrades to enhance events, and enjoy the lovely feline companion Charles along the way. But don't forget -- it's a race against the clock and you owe the landlord money!

Become The Matchmaker - Analyze and interview clients, scout the perfect location, select the finest gifts and plan their dates. You might not be the best bachelor/bachelorette, but at least you can be the best matchmaker in the game!

Clients - Procedurally-generated clients with a (nearly) endless combination of personality types, perk points, and personal tastes. Different kinds of people with different needs for love!

Special Clients - Meet unique clients each with intriguing backstories and goals (with hot potential lovers). Will you assist them in obtaining their one true love? Or would it be more fun to purposefully sabotage the moment?

Upgrades - Upgrades people, upgrades! Earn rewards with every successful match, which can be spent to upgrade your skills and improve your office. Unlocking more of your matchmaking capabilities!

Chill and Relax - Play and enjoy the game at your own pace. After all, love takes time to bloom and shouldn't be rushed.

Hot singles near your area and they're ready to date! Not with you, no. Your job is to find them the perfect date and become the best matchmaker in town.
70010000076089.intro: Find the perfect date for your clients and become the best matchmaker!
70010000076089.name: Matchmaker Agency

70010000086533.description:
"Step into Terry’s flip flops in this short and delightfully sweet adventure of self-discovery as he uncovers what it means to be an inhabitant of Sprankelwater.


Key Features:
- Explore a densely packed, tiny open world town at any pace and in any way you like. Slow, fast, by foot, by car, by paraglider! It’s up to you.
- Uncover a wholesome story through hilarious interactions with weird Sprankelwaterians.
- Collect TURBO JUNK and upgrade the boost capacity of Terry’s very own car.
- Catch insects, dig holes, destroy cars, become rich, wear hats.
- Listen to a joyful and heart-warming soundtrack from the composer of Wuppo."
70010000086533.intro: Terry wants to launch himself into space using his new car. Doing something this cool and reckless will surely make him the talk of the town.
70010000086533.name: Tiny Terry's Turbo Trip

70010000087083.description:
Recall: Empty Wishes is a psychological thriller set in Taiwan during the 2010s. Follow Yonny, a sister determined to uncover the truth behind the mysterious disappearance of her brother, Tommy. As she delves deeper, she confronts unsettling secrets, blurring the lines between reality and illusion.

What led to the sudden disappearance of Tommy Lin, a smart and considerate boy? One day, Yonny discovers an old toy phone receiver she and Tommy used as children. This mysterious device connects Yonny and her friend to a surreal realm where they can enter the memory echoes of certain individuals linked to Tommy. Using the receiver, they tap into these people’s deepest desires, ultimately seeking to uncover the truth behind Tommy’s disappearance.

Step into the roles of Yonny and Phoebe as they relive the memories of crucial characters linked to Tommy's fate. Each chapter delves into one character’s past, unveiling their innermost wishes and secrets. In this captivating 2D side-scrolling adventure, players interact with a full cast of characters, collect key items, make pivotal choices, and investigate detailed scenes to unravel the mystery of Tommy's disappearance.

Features:
- Immersive adventure based on the culture of Taiwanese students in the 2010s
- Non-linear storytelling that combines elements of fantasy, mystery, and horror
- Multiple character perspectives with alternate points of view and narration
- Choices that affect other characters and endings
2D side-scrolling gameplay with interactive elements and puzzle-solving
- Pixel-art graphics combined with hand-drawn portraits of characters
- Multiple language support, including English, Chinese and Japanese
70010000087083.intro: Echoes of the past linger—will you dare to listen?
70010000087083.name: Recall: Empty Wishes

70010000087598.description:
Puzzle & Summoner is a competitive puzzle game.
Try to erase blocks by swapping blocks and aligning blocks of the same color.
When you erase a block, a monster is summoned and starts attacking.
The more you chain the monsters together, the higher their level and the more powerful their attacks will be.
Summon monsters with various abilities to win the battle.
70010000087598.intro: A competitive puzzle game in which players summon monsters to fight!
70010000087598.name: Puzzle & Summoner

70010000087635.description:
You’re tasked with running Amber Isle’s only shop. Gather, craft and sell items to meet the needs of your diverse Paleofolk customers. Does your brachiosaur buddy need a canvas as long as his neck? Maybe your microraptor amigo needs a mini-sized chair? Perhaps even some water-proof paper for a plesiosaur in peril? Different customers also have different needs, behaviours and preferences to learn. Haggle, pawn, and counter-offer your way to the top of the Shop Rankings! It’s up to you to run a successful shop to bring Amber Isle back from the brink of fossilisation! 

**Name and decorate your very own shop!**

Name, customise and run your shop your way! Use your profits to unlock new shop decor, walls, floors and more. As your shop gains popularity, plan your layout wisely, expand your floorspace and make your shop more efficient.

**Rebuild the island!**

You can also use your shop profits to help rebuild the island and unlock new areas. Decorate with paths, foliage, and amenities to make Amber Isle an attractive destination. Only then will our Paleofolk pals consider packing up and moving in permanently!

**Meet the Paleofolk!**

Paleofolk come in a wide variety of shapes, sizes and species-  it’s not just dinosaurs! There’s Ice Age mammals, Permian amphibians, marine life, invertebrates, and more! Amber Isle has 48 different Paleofolk to befriend, all with unique personalities, preferences, dialogue, and quests.  

Get closer to Paleofolk by hanging out with them and fulfilling their requests. As your friendship grows, Paleofolk will share new upgrades and recipes with you. With your help, they can even build their own stalls, cafes, gardens, and communal areas on Amber Isle!

**Create your own Paleofolk!**

Express your penchant for the prehistoric by designing your very own Paleofolk! Change your clothes, crests, colours, and more in our character customiser! Pick from 5 body pre-sets; Small Herbivore, Large Herbivore, Raptor, Large Theropod and Mammal. What type of Paleofolk will you be?

**The Story So Far…**

Amber Isle is down to its last remaining residents; the grumpy iguanodon Mayor Clawsworth, the peppy Pteranodon courier Maple, and the mega-keen Megalosaurus intern Adi. In a last-ditch attempt to revitalise Amber Isle, Mayor Clawsworth reluctantly agrees to let you open a shop. During your adventure, you’ll learn more about your new friends, the history of the island and how exactly it fell into disrepair…

**So, what are you waiting for!?**

Let's stock the shelves and dust the displays, because it's almost opening time for your brand new adventure on Amber Isle!
70010000087635.intro: Welcome... to Amber Isle! A shop management/social sim set in a quaint, friendly world of prehistoric animal islanders called Paleofolk!
70010000087635.name: Amber Isle

70010000088653.description:
In a mysterious underground laboratory, dangerous creatures have escaped. The road to the surface is blocked by many obstacles, but top scientists never complain about the environment. The organs and genes of unknown creatures can be your power. Make good use of them and create yourself a path of flesh and blood.

You can use basic programming logic to deeply customize your skill sets, and you can also create organs with different attributes and functions with the special crafting system.

Use simple programming logic to build organ links. The skill building process is highly visualized and can be easily debugged.

The game includes hundreds of organs with different functions. Each organ can also be mutated to obtain additional affixes which can further generate more unpredictable changes.

The difficulty of the game can be automatically adjusted to the progress of the game. After completing the main acts, there are still more difficult challenges, more modes and content to explore.
70010000088653.intro: An RPG game with the main content of treasure hunting and character building.
70010000088653.name: Bioweaver

70010000089761.description:
This is the sequel to Marfusha, the second entry in the series of high-tempo shooting game with simple controls.

Play as Snezhinka, an employee of a private military company in a dystopian world depicted in beautiful 2.5D pixel art. Go to various different battlefields and defend your objectives from the enemy's onslaught.

Every day you manage to survive will net you a salary, but this goes through all sorts of tax deductions and other payments... and you'll have to use your meager earnings left over to strengthen yourself, buy new equipment, and recruit coworkers.

In Story Mode, the story changes based on which coworker you choose to fight with. Read every story to their ends over multiple playthroughs.

There are also two different Challenge Modes that both fully support online rankings, as well as a Collection where you can view all sorts of elements you obtain in-game.

The console version comes with the artbook included.
70010000089761.intro: Brave the battlefield to save your sister, the hero of the Molten Iron Squadron.
70010000089761.name: Snezhinka

70010000090234.description:
[Game Background]
A side-scrolling run-and-gun action game set in the future. The protagonist, Kevin, who has lost everything and was reborn as a cyborg, begins his quest for revenge against the alien Golida who took everything from him.
 
[Game Synopsis]
Year 4373. Kevin, once praised as a legendary war hero. Now an old and ailing retired soldier, he was spending a peaceful old age on a convalescent ship with his beloved dog, Andy. That is, until the alien Golida invaded, causing the ship to explode and taking away his beloved dog Andy and most of his body.
 
[Experience Various Suits and Intense Battles]
Utilize a variety of combat suits to defeat all the alien Golida! It's time to start your bloody revenge against Golida by discovering various combat suits throughout the game and leveraging the unique features each suit offers.
 
[Explore the diverse planets of Helios]
About 130 years ago, humans left the Solar System and migrated to the Helios system. Explore the nine mysterious planets in the Helios system. Uncover the secrets hidden within Helios.
 
[Discover Hidden Secrets]
Search for the secrets concealed on the nine planets of Helios. You can find various collectibles and uncover diverse stories.
70010000090234.intro: They should never have ticked him off. Begin a hot-blooded revenge as the protagonist Kevin, who has lost everything and was reborn as a cyborg!
70010000090234.name: METAL SUITS: Counter-attack

70010000090725.description:
Desvelado is the first Bed-Time-Vania game in history! Help our hero Vampy fight insomnia one last time by turning off every light in the castle before going to sleep in his cozy coffin.

• Immortal gameplay: Classic 2D platformer mechanics.
• Sharp controller: Slide, jump and dash to move swiftly.
• Challenging puzzles and multiple enemies to overcome
• Bloody animations: Enjoy a unique visual style, with hand-crafted animations.
• Vampiric music to get in the mood.
• 100+ Rooms to solve.
• 3 Main zones: The Castle, the Dungeon, and the Catacombs.
• 3 Final levels: What you learned in each area will be put to the test.
• Bonus Levels: Some rooms are optional, but if you'll get a reward if you manage to complete them all!
70010000090725.intro: Turn off the lights, dodge the ghosts and go to sleep as soon as you can in this hand-crafted 2d platformer!
70010000090725.name: Desvelado

70010000091619.description:
SokoCrab is a delightful puzzle game where you control a clever crab tasked with pushing barrels onto spots to unlock the path to the next level. Combining classic puzzle-style mechanics with a charming beach theme, SokoCrab challenges players to think thoroughly and plan their moves carefully to overcome increasingly complex puzzles.

Positioning is the key to success in SokoCrab. Since the crab can only push barrels, you must anticipate every step to avoid getting stuck. Each level introduces new challenges, from tight spaces to multiple barrels and buttons, testing your spatial reasoning and problem-solving skills.

The gameplay is simple yet highly engaging, offering a relaxing but rewarding experience. With each level you conquer, you’ll feel a sense of accomplishment as you navigate through the puzzles.

SokoCrab is perfect for fans of logic puzzles and strategy games, offering a blend of charm, challenge, and fun. Are you ready to step onto the beach and help the crab complete its journey?

- Exciting 40 levels to enjoy
- Unlock achievements as you play
- A pixel-art game with a fun theme
70010000091619.intro: Solve puzzles as a crab, pushing barrels on a beach in 40 fun levels!
70010000091619.name: Sokocrab

70010000091803.description:
Slasher: Origins is a chaotic, 2.5D, auto-attack survival game with rogue-lite elements and noir-anime storytelling. Unlock powerful heroes, create builds of unique abilities, and survive the escalating inferno of Mephistopheles’ underworld. 

Noir-Anime Art Style 
Immerse yourself in a striking visual experience, combining the sharp, stylized aesthetics of anime with the dark, moody tones of film noir. Every world you enter is a vivid yet ominous landscape, brought to life with meticulous detail and a haunting atmosphere.

Choose Your Heroes
Choose from a total of 10 heroes, each with a distinct backstory, abilities, and playstyle. Start with three formidable characters and unlock more as you progress. Each hero has a unique starting weapon and abilities that evolve as you level up. 

Deep Progression System
Collect Experience and Gems during your runs to empower your heroes. Unlock new skills, weapons, and abilities with every level up, creating different builds that can withstand the onslaught of demonic forces.

Challenging Dark Worlds
Conquer eight increasingly difficult worlds, each guarded by a powerful boss. These worlds grow more perilous with each step, demanding smart build tactics and precise movement timing to survive.

Hero Customisation 
Unlock and equip new skins for your heroes, personalizing your experience as you battle the forces of darkness. Unleash powerful "Animated Ultras," cinematic finishing moves that devastate your enemies in style.

Endless Play
With procedural generated levels, countless hero builds, and an ever-increasing challenge, no two runs are the same. Dive back in to unlock new characters, worlds, and abilities, and see how far you can push your limits.
70010000091803.name: Slasher: Origins

70050000052201.description:
Featuring some iconic Team17 franchise items and original Amber Isle pieces, you’re sure to be a smash hit with all kinds of Paleofolk!

10 Customizable Clothing Options!
6 Wallpapers for your shop!
Worms Island Décor Piece
70050000052201.intro: Get ready to decorate your shop, your island and even yourself with our super shiny Starter Pack!
70050000052201.name: Amber Isle - Starter Pack

70070000024577.description:
Welome to Amber Isle. Our Deluxe Edition offers you the best pack of items to get your Paleo adventure on the right track! Included in this edition is:
·        Base Game
·        Starter Pack
70070000024577.name: Amber Isle - Deluxe Edition

70070000026539.description:
Experience fast-paced and intense action with:

Hexapoda: After a nuclear apocalypse, defend our planet from giant insects in this retro pixel-art shoot 'em up. Immerse yourself in unique visuals and an epic electro soundtrack!

I Got Isekai'd into a Shmup: Experience the unique adventure of an isekai inside a pixel-art shoot 'em up where you can choose one of 4 ships, each piloted by a character with their own personality and dialogues. Navigate through perilous levels, accompanied by the virtuoso melodies of a metal instrumental soundtrack!
70070000026539.intro: Dive into the thrilling universe of arcade shoot 'em ups with Vertical Blast Vol.1, an exclusive bundle by TOMAGameStudio!
70070000026539.name: Vertical Blast Vol. 1

70010000082840.description:
+ Explore the entire island with your trusted companions, crossing golden wheat fields and snowy plains, visiting the library, and climbing the magical tower.
+ Choose from hundreds of abilities to build your unique playstyle!
+ Join the island's charming inhabitants to uncover the secrets of the isolated land and reveal the truth behind the Demon King!
70010000082840.intro: This is a Roguelike adventure game with Meta elements. You are a witch, yet not a witch. Step through the magic mirror, break the fourth wall, and uncover the real you!
70010000082840.name: Witch of the Meta Loop

70010000086417.description:
On your quest to find a beautiful new home you will discovers distant places, friendly and calm animals, and amazing and dangerously habitats.

You are a tiny bee in a giant environment and move continuously forward. You are free to fly wherever you want and explore the level to your heart’s desire. 
After you have played around a little and enjoyed the sensation of flying you start to discover the nearby areas and hidden secrets and find a couple of different items. 

For once there are energy potions which fill your energy meter to continuously fly faster until you run out of energy. 
Secondly there are golden flowers hidden everywhere in the levels that you can collect as a reward for exploring even the more hidden parts of the levels – collecting all of them unlocks an extra achievement in each level.

Last but not least there are the bright shining knowledge shards that show you the way into the next area. Whenever you collect one the next one will spawn ahead of you and show you the right way.

Once you have found a certain amount of knowledge shards you will be able to enter the next area and the story continues. Each area is another part of a world that a bee could experience and a little step further to find a new home.  Therefore, each level has a different color theme, general setting, mood and story. 

At the beginning of each area is a short break in which in which a part of poem is read to you. The poem talks about the bee and it’s journey to find a new home and explains a little bit about the level that lies ahead.
70010000086417.intro: This game is a story-driven, narrative 3D flight exploration game in which you control a little bee on its journey to find a new home.
70010000086417.name: Bumblebee - Search for Happiness

70010000086566.description:
100 years ago, humans triumphed over dragons, bringing peace to the world. But whispers of their return ignite a thrilling tale! Take on the role of a brave protagonist, uncover the mystery behind a young girl tied to the dragons, and decide the fate of an entire world.

Master the innovative Rotation Battle System—switch party positions mid-fight to outmaneuver enemies, protect your allies, and strike with precision. Build up the Ruin Gauge to unleash devastating attacks in Ruin Mode, summoning special allies to turn the tide of battle. Strategy meets epic fantasy in a game where every choice matters!
70010000086566.intro: Dragons or humans—who will prevail? Join the battle in this epic RPG!
70010000086566.name: Dead Dragons

70010000088171.description:
After washing onto the island's shores, you'll find yourself the newly minted owner of a humble plot of land. Pull up your sleeves, grab your tools, and get to work building a farm that will last not only a lifetime but span generations!

Echoes of Plum Grove is a casual, cozy farm simulator where your decisions have consequences. What to plant, what to stock for the winter, and who to befriend will shape not only the town of Honeywood but the island itself.

Winter brings new levels of danger to players. With your very survival at stake, you'll have to work your land, fish the sea, cook meals, craft, forage, and more to ensure you make it through the cold season. Should you neglect to prepare, your lineage could end before anyone can uncover the island's secrets. While your main focus should be on survival, the town of Honeywood puts its best festive foot forward with many celebrations taking place.

Honeywood may be a cozy hamlet, where the people are the heart of the town. Everyone who lives on the island has their own schedules, jobs, traits, hobbies, and children. Work together with your fellow townsfolk to forge an even greater community—or just get them out of the way with harsh words and drastic measures.

Building relationships is at the core of Echoes of the Plum Grove. As you grow your family tree and your original character perishes, you'll find yourself playing as someone else within your family. While building relationships is crucial to your experience, take time to explore the island. There are many mysteries to uncover. Some say there's a witch that lives on the island and brings to town strange items. Others swear they've heard something coming from the bay. A few wonder what exists at the bottom of the mines. Adventure to the edges of the island to see what Echoes of Plum Grove has in store for you!
70010000088171.intro:
A new life awaits in Honeywood! 
Build a thriving community that will last generations.
Farm, socialize, and uncover the secrets of the island!
70010000088171.name: Echoes of the Plum Grove

70010000090627.description:
House Mansion Flipper is an exciting renovation and design simulator where players take on the role of a skilled renovator, transforming old, neglected houses into luxurious mansions.Dive into the challenge of revitalizing run-down properties or crafting brand-new interiors from scratch.With each successful project, improve your skills and reputation in the competitive world of real estate and design.
 
Key Features:
- Detailed Renovation: Repair, remodel, and decorate houses to transform them into dream homes.
- Budget Management: Plan your expenses to maximize profit and stay within cost limits.
- Partition Installation Design new spaces by building partitions with drywall. The process involves several stages.
- Custom Design: Add furniture, wallpaper, and accessories to create unique spaces.
- Realistic Graphics: Explore a detailed environment with high-quality graphics.
- Decorating and Furnishing In the final stage, transform the house into a work of art. Arrange furniture, decorate walls with paintings, add decorative items, and choose textiles to give the interior a personal touch.
     
Turn neglected houses into architectural masterpieces by showcasing your skills and creative vision in House Mansion Flipper!
70010000090627.intro: Rebuild, redesign and make your dream homes!
70010000090627.name: House Mansion Flipper

70010000091387.description:
Explore a vast interconnected world, gain new abilities and weapons, battle epic bosses and stop the plans of an evil corporation before it’s too late!

Story:
In the near future, the world is in an energy crisis. When all hope has been lost, world famous scientist Dr. Klaus makes a surprise announcement: the discovery of the "Tetra Cell". It’s incredible energy-producing properties could be used for the good of mankind. However, 24 hours later, he mysteriously disappears and his lab is destroyed in an explosion. The industrialist A. Easton, President of Easton Industries is suspected to have kidnapped Dr. Klaus and that he intends to use the Tetra Cell to create a new type of super weapon.

You assume the role of Vincent Fury, a special operative on a mission to infiltrate the top secret research facility of Easton Industries, rescue Dr. Klaus and recover the missing Tetra Cell before it’s too late!

Explore a huge world as you face the private army of evil industrialist A. Easton and his gang of top executives.
As you advance through the game, you will discover new items and abilities, as well as gain money to purchase new equipment from merchants, which will help you access new areas and battle more powerful enemies, including fearsome bosses. 

Features:
-Explore a vast interconnected world and uncover new areas using newly acquired skills and equipment
-Exhilarating run and gun action
-Beautiful hand-crafted 16-bit pixel art
-Hundreds of unique items to discover, including guns, melee weapons, bombs and accessories
-10+ bosses and tons of enemy types
-Acquire new abilities in an authentic Metroidvania experience
-Take control of a variety of different mechs, each with its own array of attacks and abilities
-Discover secrets in breakable walls and acquire loot and powerful new equipment
-Destructible environments
-Alternate endings
-Incredible soundtrack by Dominic Ninmark
70010000091387.intro: Guns of Fury is a retro-inspired action platformer that combines the run & gun and Metroidvania genres.
70010000091387.name: Guns of Fury

70010000091447.description:
Enter the world of truck restoration with Truck Mechanic Sim 2025!
